CodeGen.SQLStatement: Select hec_cas_case_universalpropertyvalue.HEC_CAS_Case_RefID as case_id, hec_cas_case_universalpropertyvalue.Value_Boolean as is_send_invoice_to_practice From hec_cas_case_universalpropertyvalue Inner Join hec_cas_case_universalproperties On hec_cas_case_universalpropertyvalue.HEC_CAS_Case_UniversalProperty_RefID = hec_cas_case_universalproperties.HEC_CAS_Case_UniversalPropertyID And hec_cas_case_universalproperties.PropertyName = 'Send Invoice to Practice' And hec_cas_case_universalproperties.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And hec_cas_case_universalproperties.IsDeleted = 0 Where hec_cas_case_universalpropertyvalue.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And hec_cas_case_universalpropertyvalue.IsDeleted = 0
